Talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Tired_01>Maybe I could manage if I had something
to break the rocks with, but as it is, my
wings are clipped.
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>Really?! I'd appreciate that. We were
trying to collect what food we could
from this cave.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>As you can see, a cave-in closed off
the entrance, and I can't get in.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>But if you make a <clr:0000>hole in the rocks big
enough for me to walk through<clr:ffff>, I can
bring that food back to the village.
Talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Ease_00>I see. <sp:5:0:0>That's too bad.


There's food in that cave, but I can't bring
it back to the village if I can't get in.

Seems my only option is to dig through
those rocks. Even getting prepped for
that could take a while though...
<sp:3:0:2:0501>Hmm. <sp:5:0:0>Maybe I should just cut my losses
and give up on this for today.
Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Again, sorry to trouble you with this.


If you could make a <clr:0000>hole big enough for
me to walk through<clr:ffff>, it'd be a huge help.
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Think_01>A cave-in? You've got to be kidding me.
How am I supposed to get inside now?
Talk15:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_01>I hate to ask, but...could you clear the
way into the cave?
Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Tired_01>I was hauling food out of there when the
entrance collapsed. Now what do I do?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0300>I should have picked some bomb flowers
from the other caves. Could've used 'em
to blow these rocks away. What foul luck.
I hate to leave all that food behind, but
maybe I just need to call today a wash
and come back tomorrow.
Talk16:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Really?! I'd appreciate that.


<sp:3:0:2:0001>It'd be great if you could make a hole <clr:0000>big
enough <clr:ffff>for me to walk through.

That will let me bring the supply of food
in the cave back to the village.
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>This isn't good. The cave entrance is
completely blocked off!

Ugh, why didn't I harvest bomb flowers
from the other caves? I could've used
them to blow these rocks away.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>There's still food in that cave I haven't
hauled out... I have to get in there
somehow.
Talk17:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Tired_01>Ah. <sp:5:0:0>I suppose that's fair.


It doesn't seem like there's any way in
except through these rocks. And I did not
come here prepared to dig.
<sp:3:0:2:0501>Hmmm. <sp:5:0:0>Maybe I just need to call it a day
and come back tomorrow.
Talk18:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Hey, could—<sp:5:0:0> Could you get through those
rocks for me?
Talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>Hey! <sp:5:0:0>Those rocks didn't know what hit
them. You're amazing!

<sp:3:0:2:0101>Now I can bring some supplies back to
the village! Thank you so much!

Oh, right, I need to reward you somehow,
don't I? <sp:5:0:0>Here, take this.

Consider it a token of my gratitude!<sp:5:1:0>
Talk19:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Listen, I—<sp:5:0:0> Would you break through the
rocks blocking the cave for me?
Talk02_01:
The entrance to the cave is completely
blocked off.
Talk07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>All right, I'm going to go check if that
food is still good. Thank you for opening
a path for me!
Talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>Hey! <sp:5:0:0>I saw what you did. That was
awesome! Those rocks never stood
a chance.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>I was searching the cave for food to bring
back to the village, but a cave-in blocked
off the entrance and put a stop to that.
<sp:3:0:2:0101>But now, thanks to you, I can fly the
supplies in there back home.

I know you didn't do it for me, but...
Here's a token of my gratitude. <sp:5:0:0>Take it.<sp:5:1:0>
Talk09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Tulin? Do you need him for something?


He's out collecting food at another cave
right now. I'm pretty sure he was with
Gesane's group.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>There's a <clr:0000>bonfire<clr:ffff> burning outside the
<clr:0000>entrance <clr:ffff>of the cave he was headed to,
so that should help you find him.
It'll be a good place to warm up and rest
if you feel yourself starting to freeze too.
Talk20:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Hey...<sp:5:0:0> Would you be willing to open up the
blocked cave for me?
